changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update COMPANY set COUNTRY_ID = 2;

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update COMPANY set LOCAL_NAME = NAME

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update PERMISSION set URL = URL_TO_PERMIT

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update PERMISSION set PERMISSION_TYPE = 'DENY'

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update company set country_id = (select id from country where LAST_UPDATED_BY = 'migrated' and upper(iso) = (select upper(iso) from country where id = country_id))
update company_location set country_id = (select id from country where LAST_UPDATED_BY = 'migrated' and upper(iso) = (select upper(iso) from country where id = country_id))
delete from country where LAST_UPDATED_BY is null or LAST_UPDATED_BY != 'migrated'

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update company_sector set sector_id = (select min(id) from sector where code is not null and name != 'Dummy'); delete from sector where code = 'S000';

changeSet.author: ozyildirim
changeSet.sql: UPDATE company_location_type clt SET (LOCATION_TYPES_) = (SELECT lt.id FROM location_type lt WHERE clt.LOCATION_TYPES= lt.value);

changeSet.author: ozyildirim
changeSet.sql: UPDATE company_location_phone clt SET (NUMBER_TYPE_) = (SELECT lt.id FROM PHONE_type lt WHERE clt.NUMBER_TYPE= lt.value);

changeSet.author: ozyildirim
changeSet.sql: UPDATE COMPANY_BUSINESS_SEGMENT clt SET (TYPE_) = (SELECT lt.id FROM BUSINESS_SEGMENT_type lt WHERE clt.TYPE= lt.value);

changeSet.author: ozyildirim
changeSet.sql: UPDATE COMPANY_CONTACT_SERV_TYPE clt SET (COMPANY_BUSINESS_SEGMENT_TYPE_) = (SELECT lt.id FROM BUSINESS_SEGMENT_type lt WHERE clt.COMPANY_BUSINESS_SEGMENT_TYPES= lt.value);

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update LOCATION_TYPE set CODE = VALUE, NAME = VALUE, STATUS = STATUS_TYPE;

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update PHONE_TYPE set CODE = VALUE, NAME = VALUE, STATUS = STATUS_TYPE;

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update BUSINESS_SEGMENT_TYPE set CODE = VALUE, NAME = VALUE, STATUS = STATUS_TYPE;

changeSet.author: kilimci
kilimci
changeSet.sql: update COMPANY_CUSTOMER_RELATION ccr set ccr.employee_customer_relation_id=(select id from EMPLOYEE_CUSTOMER_RELATION where code = ccr.EMPLOYEE_ROLE);

changeSet.author: kilimci
kilimci
changeSet.sql: update COMPANY_RELATION cr set cr.company_relation_type_id=(select id from COMPANY_RELATION_TYPE where code = cr.COMPANY_RELATION_TYPE);

changeSet.author: kilimci
kilimci
changeSet.sql: insert into USAGE_TYPE(ID,CODE,NAME,STATUS,DELETED) values(SEQ_USAGETYPE.nextval, 'WORK', 'Work', 'ACTIVE', 0); insert into USAGE_TYPE(ID,CODE,NAME,STATUS,DELETED) values(SEQ_USAGETYPE.nextval, 'PERSONAL', 'Personal', 'ACTIVE', 0);

changeSet.author: kilimci
kilimci
kilimci
changeSet.sql: update COMPANY c set c.company_type_id=(select id from COMPANY_TYPE where code = c.TYPE); update AUD_COMPANY c set c.company_type_id=(select id from COMPANY_TYPE where code = c.TYPE);

changeSet.author: verid
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO LOCATION_TYPE (ID, DELETED, CODE, NAME, STATUS) VALUES ('-1', '0', '1', 'OFFICE', 'ACTIVE');

changeSet.author: kilimci
kilimci
changeSet.sql: update COMPANY_IMPORT_QUEUE set APPLICATION_COMPANY_ID = to_char(APPLICATION_COMPANY_ID_OLD);

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update COMPANY_CONTACT_PHONE set PHONE = OLD_PHONE
update AUD_COMPANY_CONTACT_PHONE set PHONE = OLD_PHONE

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update COMPANY_LOCATION_PHONE set PHONE = OLD_PHONE
update AUD_COMPANY_LOCATION_PHONE set PHONE = OLD_PHONE

changeSet.author: kilimci
kilimci
changeSet.sql: update COMPANY_ROLE set role_type_id = relation_type_id; update AUD_COMPANY_ROLE set role_type_id = relation_type_id;

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: delete from COMPANY_RELATION_TYPE;

changeSet.author: kilimci
kilimci
changeSet.sql: update COUNTRY set EU_MEMBER = 1 where currency = 'EUR'
update COUNTRY set EU_MEMBER = 0 where currency != 'EUR'

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update COMPANY_EXPORT_QUEUE set RETRY_COUNT = 0;

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update company set OWNED_BY_EKOL = 0;

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update company_import_queue set completed_by = last_updated_by, completed_date = last_updated where status = 'SUCCESS' and last_updated_by is not null;

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update company set tax_office_code = (select code from tax_office where id = company.tax_office_id)

changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: UPDATE COUNTRY SET CURRENCY = 'TRY' WHERE CURRENCY = 'TRL'

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update company set short_name_checked = 0
update company_location set short_name_checked = 0

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update company set stats_customer = 0, stats_participant = 0

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update COMPANY_LOCATION set POINT_ON_MAP_CONFIRMED = 0

changeSet.author: kilimci
changeSet.sql: update AUD_COMPANY_LOCATION set POINT_ON_MAP_CONFIRMED = 0

changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: UPDATE COMPANY_ROLE SET DELETED = 1, DELETED_AT = SYSTIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED = SYSTIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY = 'eray.oral' WHERE DELETED = 0

changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: UPDATE COMPANY SET CREATED_FROM_CRM = 0

changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: UPDATE AUD_COMPANY SET CREATED_FROM_CRM = 0

changeSet.author: AliRiza.Bostanci
changeSet.sql: update COMPANY_CONTACT_PHONE set NUMBER_TYPE_TMP = NUMBER_TYPE

changeSet.author: AliRiza.Bostanci
changeSet.sql: update AUD_COMPANY_CONTACT_PHONE set NUMBER_TYPE_TMP = NUMBER_TYPE

changeSet.author: Dogukan Sahinturk
changeSet.sql: UPDATE BUSINESS_SEGMENT_TYPE SET RANK = 999
UPDATE BUSINESS_SEGMENT_TYPE SET RANK = 1 WHERE CODE = 'ROAD'
UPDATE BUSINESS_SEGMENT_TYPE SET RANK = 2 WHERE CODE = 'SEA'
UPDATE BUSINESS_SEGMENT_TYPE SET RANK = 3 WHERE CODE = 'AIR'
UPDATE BUSINESS_SEGMENT_TYPE SET RANK = 4 WHERE CODE = 'DTR'
UPDATE BUSINESS_SEGMENT_TYPE SET RANK = 5 WHERE CODE = 'CCL'

changeSet.author: Dogukan Sahinturk
changeSet.sql: UPDATE BUSINESS_SEGMENT_TYPE SET RANK = 6 WHERE CODE = 'WHM'
UPDATE BUSINESS_SEGMENT_TYPE SET RANK = 7 WHERE CODE = 'BWH'

changeSet.author: Fulya Koncu
changeSet.sql: UPDATE COMPANY_CONTACT_PHONE SET PHONE = CONCAT(REGION_CODE,PHONE) WHERE COUNTRY_CODE='34'
UPDATE COMPANY_CONTACT_PHONE SET REGION_CODE='' WHERE COUNTRY_CODE='34'

changeSet.author: Fulya Koncu
changeSet.sql: UPDATE COMPANY_LOCATION_PHONE SET PHONE = CONCAT(REGION_CODE,PHONE) WHERE COUNTRY_CODE='34'
UPDATE COMPANY_LOCATION_PHONE SET REGION_CODE='' WHERE COUNTRY_CODE='34'

changeSet.author: Fulya Koncu
changeSet.sql: UPDATE COMPANY_CONTACT_EMAIL SET EMAIL_ADDRESS = CONCAT(CONCAT(EMAIL_ACCOUNT,'@'),EMAIL_DOMAIN)

changeSet.author: Fulya Koncu
changeSet.sql: UPDATE AUD_COMPANY_CONTACT_EMAIL SET EMAIL_ADDRESS = CONCAT(CONCAT(EMAIL_ACCOUNT,'@'),EMAIL_DOMAIN)
